T02TD3580E:215a-1: aushn'i sha bi dza ya s'a dha nam /
T02TD3580E:215a-3: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs //
T02TD3580E:215a-4: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3580E:215a-5: 'der sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas zla ba la bhr'um yig dkar po las skyes pa'i sku mdog dkar mo //
T02TD3580E:215a-9: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3580E:215a-10: phyag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma bsam par bya'o //
T02TD3580E:215a-11: ser pa dang nag po ni g-yas dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //
T02TD3580E:215a-12: g-yas kyi phyag bzhi rnams su sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02TD3580E:215a-13: padma la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD3580E:215a-14: mda' dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya rnams so //
T02TD3580E:215a-15: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi rnams su gzhu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /
T02TD3580E:215a-16: mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang bum pa gang ba'o //
T02TD3580E:215b-0: mchod rten gyi @215b phug gi nang du bzhugs pa //
T02TD3580E:215b-1: rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan par bskyed nas rang gi sa bon padma la gnas pa snying gar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD3580E:215b-2: de'i rjes su spyi bo dang /
T02TD3580E:215b-6: rkang pa rnams su go rims ji lta ba bzhin du aom h'um tr'm hr'i:aam aa:zhes pa'i yi ge rnams blta bar bya'o //
T02TD3580E:215b-7: de nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD3580E:215b-9: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
